decisions.description: Checks to see if the Annual Revenue field is blank and if Storeleads has an Annual Revenue field
decisions.name: Annual_Revenue_field_blank_and_is_there_an_Enrichment_Tool_value
decisions.label: Annual Revenue field blank and is there an Enrichment Tool value?
decisions.defaultConnectorLabel: No, Annual Revenue field is populated and/or there is no enrichment tool value

rules.name: Is_Annual_Revenue_field_is_blank_and_has_a_Charm_value
rules.label: Is Annual Revenue field is blank and has a Charm value

decisions.description: Checks if any Partner Tiers are changed to Gold and stamp the date/time for each of those changes if they Gold Date/Time Stamp is blank.
decisions.name: Are_any_of_the_partner_tiers_changed_to_Gold
decisions.label: Are any of the partner tiers changed to Gold?

rules.name: Yes_Partner_Tiers_have_been_changed_to_Gold
rules.conditionLogic: 4 AND ((1 AND 5) OR (2 AND 7) OR (3 AND 6))
rules.label: Yes, Partner Tiers have been changed to Gold

decisions.description: Checks if any Partner Tiers are changed will then determine if any are Platinum and stamp the date/time for each of those changes if they are.
decisions.name: Are_any_of_the_partner_tiers_changed_to_Platinum
decisions.label: Are any of the partner tiers changed to Platinum?

rules.name: Yes_Partner_Tiers_have_been_changed_to_Platinum
rules.conditionLogic: 4 AND ((1 AND 5) OR (2 AND 7) OR (3 AND 6))
rules.label: Yes, Partner Tiers have been changed to Platinum

decisions.description: Checks if any Partner Tiers are changed to Silver and stamp the date/time for each of those changes if they Silver Date/Time Stamp is blank.
decisions.name: Are_any_of_the_partner_tiers_changed_to_Silver
decisions.label: Are any of the partner tiers changed to Silver?

rules.name: Yes_Partner_Tiers_have_been_changed_to_Silver
rules.conditionLogic: 4 AND ((1 AND 5) OR (2 AND 7) OR (3 AND 6))
rules.label: Yes, Partner Tiers have been changed to Silver

decisions.description: SFDC 4201 - Decides if the Assigned Account field has been created or updated
decisions.name: Assigned_Account_has_been_created_or_updated
decisions.label: Assigned Account has been created or updated

decisions.name: Did_Global_Ultimate_Parent_Change_And_is_Populated
decisions.label: Did Global Ultimate Parent Change (And is Populated)?

rules.name: Yes_Global_Ultimate_Parent_Changed_And_is_Populated
rules.label: Yes, Global Ultimate Parent Changed (And is Populated)

decisions.name: Does_Clearbit_Enriched_the_Account
decisions.label: Does Clearbit Enriched the Account

rules.name: Yes_Clearbit_has_Enriched_the_Account
rules.label: Yes, Clearbit has Enriched the Account

decisions.name: Does_StoreLead_Enriched_the_Account
decisions.label: Does StoreLead Enriched the Account

rules.name: Yes_StoreLead_has_Enriched_the_Account
rules.label: Yes, StoreLead has Enriched the Account

decisions.description: SFDC 5135 - Map HQ State Province with StoreLeads Data when HQ State/Province is null and Exclude EMEA logic
decisions.name: Enrich_HQ_State_Province_with_StoreLeads_Data
decisions.label: Enrich HQ State/Province with StoreLeads Data

rules.name: Yes_Map_StoreLeads_Data
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 6) OR (4 AND 5 AND 6)
rules.label: Yes, Map StoreLeads Data

decisions.description:
SFDC-7374 Additional Logic for Referral Partner Accounts SFDC 4202 - Sales Segmentation to determine if Geo/Region has the Value Not Found or is Null. Grab data from Lead and Account.
Country Indicated by Rep OR HQ State/Province is changed OR (Geo/Region is changed and equals “Not Found”) AND
Geo or Region has the value “Not Found” or is null
decisions.name: Geo_Not_Found_Location_Calculation_Segmentation
decisions.label: Geo Not Found Location Calculation - Segmentation

rules.name: Geo_Not_Found
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 4 AND 3) OR (2 AND 3 AND 4) OR (2 AND 3 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7) OR (8 AND 9 AND 10 AND (11 OR 12))
rules.label: Geo Not Found

decisions.description: Checks to see if the Industry field is blank and if Storeleads has an Industry field
decisions.name: Industry_field_blank_and_is_there_an_Enrichment_Tool_value
decisions.label: Industry field blank and is there an Enrichment Tool value?
decisions.defaultConnectorLabel: No, Industry field is populated and/or there is no enrichment tool value

rules.name: Is_Industry_field_blank_and_has_a_StoreLeads_value
rules.label: Yes, Industry field is blank and has a StoreLeads value

decisions.description: SFDC-4963 Strip Parent and Brand out of Clean Domain SFDC-4841 Sets website based on account name if account is made by SF API and website is blank AND account contains a "." to account for it being in the format of a website
decisions.name: Is_Account_created_and_Website_Blank
decisions.label: Is Account created and Website Blank?

rules.name: Yes_Created_by_API_and_Website_Blank
rules.label: Yes, Created by API and Website Blank

decisions.label: Is Account created or Owner Changed?

decisions.name: Is_Account_New_0
decisions.label: Is Account New?

decisions.description: Checks if the Agency Retainer Status field was changed to a value of active or Archived. If active then Managed by Third Party? sets to TRUE, otherwise it sets to False.
decisions.name: Is_Agency_Retainer_Status_Changed_to_Active_or_Archived
decisions.label: Is Agency Retainer Status Changed to Active or Archived?

decisions.name: Is_CAM_Partner_Management_Status_set_to_Terminated
decisions.label: Is CAM Partner Management Status set to Terminated

decisions.description: SFDC-6325 For all partner accounts, if Channel Manager = Klaviyo Partners → set Account Owner as Credited Agency BDR. Otherwise, set Account Owner as Channel Manager. SFDC-6895 Run Account Owner Flow on Partner Account When Credited Partner BDR Changes
decisions.name: Is_Channel_Partner_Manager_Changed
decisions.label: Is Channel/Partner Manager Changed?

rules.name: Yes_updated
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 4 OR 7) AND 2 AND 3 AND 5 AND 6
rules.label: Yes, updated to Klaviyo Partners

rules.name: Yes_but_not_updated_to_Klaviyo_Partners
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 4 OR 6) AND 2 AND 3 AND NOT(5)
rules.label: Yes, but not updated to Klaviyo Partners

decisions.name: Partner_Type_or_Tiers_Changed
decisions.label: Partner Type or Tiers Changed?

rules.name: Yes_Partner_Tier_or_Type_changed
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 10) AND (6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9)
rules.label: Yes, Partner Tier or Type changed

decisions.description:
SFDC 4202 - Sales Segmentation to determine if Geo/Region has the Value Not Found or is Null. Grab data from Lead and Account.
Country Indicated by Rep OR HQ State/Province is changed OR (Geo/Region is changed and equals “Not Found”) AND
Geo or Region has the value “Not Found” or is null
decisions.name: Region_Not_Found_Location_Calculation_Segmentation
decisions.label: Region Not Found Location Calculation - Segmentation

rules.name: Region_Not_Found
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 OR 2) AND 4 AND (5 OR 6)) OR (3 AND 4 AND (5 OR 6))
rules.label: Region Not Found

decisions.label: Was CAM Changed?

decisions.description: SFDC-5897 and SFDC-5898. Determine if Account's MRR changed above the high touch CS service threshold, or below the At Scale CS service threshold. Stamp date fields accordingly. This will trigger LeanData routing for CSM re-assignment downstream.
decisions.name: Was_CS_Service_Threshold_Crossed
decisions.label: Was CS Service Threshold Crossed?

decisions.description: Determines if the CSM was changed, also determines if a prior node would set the CSM based on the parent account being changed.
decisions.name: Was_CSM_Changed_0
decisions.label: Was CSM Changed?

decisions.description: Determines if the CSM was changed and if so it stamps the First CSM Assignment Date so long as that date is null. It also checks if the previous decision point for parent account changing was true AND if this resulted in the CSM changing at all.
decisions.name: Was_CSM_Changed_to_non_null_value_and_is_First_CSM_Assigned_Blank
decisions.label: Was CSM Changed to non null value and is First CSM Assigned Blank?

rules.name: Yes_CSM_Changed_First_Assigned_Null
rules.label: Yes, CSM Changed, First Assigned Null

decisions.description: Checks if ecommerce integration is changed AND initial ecommerce integration is blank if so it sets the initial ecommerce integration field and date.
decisions.name: Was_Ecommerce_Integration_changed
decisions.label: Was Ecommerce Integration changed?

decisions.description: SFDC 4812 - If the Masters Partner Account of a managed account is changed, stamp the Partner's PSM on the managed account
decisions.name: Was_Masters_Partner_Account_Changed
decisions.label: Was Masters Partner Account Changed?

decisions.description: Determines if Masters Tier is set to a value and Advisors is blank. If so, Advisors inherits the Masters Tier value.
decisions.name: Was_Masters_Stamped_but_not_Advisors
decisions.label: Was Masters Stamped but not Advisors?

rules.name: Yes_Masters_was_stamped_and_Advisors_was_blank
rules.label: Yes, Masters was stamped and Advisors was blank

decisions.description: Determines if Masters Referral Partner tier was changed from a blank value to a non blank value, if so sets the date/time this occurred.
decisions.name: Was_Masters_Tier_first_set
decisions.label: Was Masters Tier first set?

decisions.description: SFDC-470 Populates various "at Last Owner Change" stamp fields when owner is changed
decisions.name: Was_owner_changed
decisions.label: Was owner changed?

decisions.description: Checks if the parent account is changed to a non blank value on a Klaviyo Record Type.
decisions.name: Was_Parent_Account_Changed
decisions.label: Was Parent Account Changed?

rules.name: Yes_Parent_Account_was_set_or_changed
rules.label: Yes, Parent Account was set or changed

decisions.description: Determines if the program was changed from a blank or prospect to active and if so sets Early Access to True
decisions.name: Was_Program_Changed_from_Prospect_to_Active
decisions.label: Was Partner Program Changed from Prospect to Active?

rules.name: Yes_program_status_changed_to_active
rules.label: Yes, program status changed to active

decisions.description: Checks if Referral Partner AE of record was changed and stamps Date/Time of Most Recent AE Assignment
decisions.name: Was_Referral_Partner_AE_of_Record_Changed_0
decisions.label: Was Referral Partner AE of Record Changed?

decisions.description: Determines if Target Account Status is Changed and stamps the current date if so.
decisions.name: Was_Target_Account_Status_Changed
decisions.label: Was Target Account Status Changed?

decisions.description: If TOS Accepted is set to true then it stamps todays date in TOS Accepted Date
decisions.name: Was_TOS_Accepted_set_to_True
decisions.label: Was TOS Accepted set to True?

decisions.description: Checks if the update widget field was changed on the account.
decisions.name: Was_Update_Widget_Changed
decisions.label: Was Update Widget Changed?

decisions.description: Checks if Ecommerce Integration, Subscribers from Page, Viewed Count, or Placed Order Value were changed and if the integration complete field is blank. If so it stamps the date the current date/time.
decisions.name: Were_any_of_the_integration_completion_indicators_changed
decisions.label: Were any of the integration completion indicators changed?

rules.name: Yes_integration_completion_indicators_were_changed
rules.label: Yes, integration completion indicators were changed

decisions.description: SFDC 3211
decisions.name: Which_Status_Was_Set
decisions.label: Which Status Was Set?

Flow.description: SFDC-7517 - Parent/Child Hierarchy logic SFDC-7374 Exclude Referral Partners from Charm and Store Lead Region updates SFDC-6939 Segmentation Sync bug post PWR 1 SFDC-6895 Run Account Owner Flow on Partner Account When Credited Partner BDR Changes SFDC-6325 Set Account owner for Partner accounts when Channel manager changes SFDC-5897 & SFDC-5898 Stamp date when MRR changes above high touch or below SAS CS thresholds SFDC-6254 Add Condition to skip Account Name and Website stamp while Backfill SFDC-5965 Remove updates to Is Sending Flows and Is Sending Campaigns date stamps SFDC-5558 - Evaluate and Prevent Automations when backfilling Account Website field SFDC-4900 Stamp website at creation field when record is created SFDC-5027 Bypass Paying Parent automation as its now moved to KStore when PWR Phase 1 is ON SFDC-5329 Update Territory Calculation Logic 3/27/24 SFDC-5184 SFDC-5107 CAM title change SFDC-5190-New Logic for BI Location Calculation Territories SFDC-5135-Bug related to Storeleads Account Creation SFDC-4628 - added PWR Phase 1 Custom Setting to be off when updating Account Name and Website with Clean Website. Added second set of nodes that fire when PWR Phase 1 Custom Setting is on to update Account Name and Website with Deduplicated Account Website field. SFDC-4968-StoreLeads Add/State Province mapping [REMOVED due to Bug Issue] Removed SFDC 3923 Automated Partner Tiering Updates SFDC-4963 - Strip Parent and Brand out of Clean Domain SFDC-4812 - When Agency Retainer Status is archived, set Partner Success Manager = null Feb 15th 2024 - SFDC-4909 - Assigned Named Account Date Stamp Fix Jan 2024 - SFDC 3923 Automated Partner Tiering Updates SFDC-4839 - Enrichment trigger updates Jan 2024 - SFDC 3923 Automated Partner Tiering (due Feb 28) SFDC-4841 - Set Website based on Account name if blank and account contains a "." For Feb 15 - SFDC-4804 Change EMEA Territory Names Account Before Save Flow. Should contain all same record field updates for Accounts. Feb 2024 - SFDC 4790 - Account before save flow missing end nodes Jan 2024 - SFDC 4202 Location Calculation - Sales Segmentation (For 2/1) Jan 2024 - SFDC 4203 - Segment/Territory Stamps - Sales Segmentation (FOR 2/1) Jan 2024 - SFDC 4201 - Named Accounts - Sales Segmentation Jan 2024 - SFDC 4529 - Pass blank website records for segmentation Nov 2023 - SFDC 3627 - Enrichment Ready Flags for Segmentation Sync (Updated) Sep 2023 - SFDC 3211 - Add date stamps for Exec Sponsor Program start date and end date Aug 2023 - SFDC-3493 Partner Title update in Was CAM Changed decision node Ma 2023 - SFDC-2096 > update textPartnerType w/ Elite tier logic Feb 2023 - SFDC - 1792 SF -> Redpoint, Update Redpoint_Formula_Sync_Widget__c on lead when KPU changes. Jan 2023 - RRS working on populating Enrichment Tool field values vSept2022 - SFDC-778 - Removing logic that determines Segment Director and Ultimate Segment Director vSept2022 - SFDC-733 Update Geographical Location vAug12 2022 SFDC-626 Fix for Set Paying Parent (previously it was setting blank values for all accounts) vAug2022 SFDC-470 - Populate stamped fields at owner change vJuly2022 SFDC-243 Added logic to populate Segment Director and Ultimate Parent Segment director fields based on Segment Director mdt SFDC-1430

formulas.description: Checks if any of the partner programs were changed from an active prospect status to a status that is not Left Program or Rejected. Used as filter criteria to determine if stamps need to happen for Early Access.
formulas.name: booleanAccountProgramChangedToActive
formulas.expression:
OR(
AND( ISCHANGED({!$Record.RP_Referral_Partner_Tier__c} ), OR( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE({!$Record.RP_Referral_Partner_Tier__c}), ""), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE({!$Record.RP_Referral_Partner_Tier__c}), "Partner Prospect")), TEXT({!$Record.RP_Referral_Partner_Tier__c}) <> "Left Program", TEXT({!$Record.RP_Referral_Partner_Tier__c}) <> "Partner Rejected" ),
AND( ISCHANGED({!$Record.Services_Tier__c} ), OR( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE({!$Record.Services_Tier__c}), ""), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE({!$Record.Services_Tier__c}), "Partner Prospect")), TEXT({!$Record.Services_Tier__c}) <> "Left Program", TEXT({!$Record.Services_Tier__c}) <> "Partner Rejected" ),
AND( ISCHANGED({!$Record.Experts_Tier__c} ), OR( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE({!$Record.Experts_Tier__c} ), ""), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE({!$Record.Experts_Tier__c} ), "Partner Prospect")), TEXT({!$Record.Experts_Tier__c} ) <> "Left Program", TEXT({!$Record.Experts_Tier__c} ) <> "Partner Rejected" )
)

formulas.description: Checks if the Agency Retainer field is set to active on create or change of that field
formulas.name: booleanAgencyRetainerChangedToActive
formulas.expression: AND( OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED({!$Record.RP_Agency_Experts_Accounts_Status__c} )), OR( ISPICKVAL({!$Record.RP_Agency_Experts_Accounts_Status__c}, "Active"), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.RP_Agency_Experts_Accounts_Status__c}, "Active - No Payout")))

formulas.description: Checks if the Agency Retainer Status is changed to Archived or set to it on creation.
formulas.name: booleanAgencyRetainerStatusChangedToArchived

formulas.description: Checks if the CAM was set or changed.
formulas.name: booleanCAMChanged

formulas.description: Used for criteria to determine if integration complete date should be stamped.
formulas.name: booleanIntegrationCompleteStamp

formulas.description: Determines if account was created in this transaction
formulas.name: booleanIsNew

formulas.description: Determines if the Masters or Advisors tier is not a prospect and the other tier is then used to run updates for the influencers tier.
formulas.name: booleanMastersOrAdvisorsNotProspect
formulas.expression: AND( TEXT({!$Record.RP_Referral_Partner_Tier__c}) = "Partner Prospect", OR( AND( ISCHANGED({!$Record.Experts_Tier__c}), TEXT({!$Record.Experts_Tier__c}) != "", TEXT({!$Record.Experts_Tier__c}) != "Partner Rejected", TEXT({!$Record.Experts_Tier__c}) != "Partner Prospect"), AND( ISCHANGED({!$Record.Services_Tier__c} ), TEXT({!$Record.Services_Tier__c}) != "", TEXT({!$Record.Services_Tier__c}) != "Partner Rejected", TEXT({!$Record.Services_Tier__c}) != "Partner Prospect" )))

formulas.description: Used to determine if the Has Active Subscribers List Date Stamp should be populated
formulas.name: booleanNumberOfActiveSubscribersChanged

formulas.description: Formula to determine if parent account was changed.
formulas.name: booleanParentAccountIsChanged

formulas.description: Checks if the website is not blank and is changed or is new.
formulas.name: booleanWebsiteSet

formulas.description: Date and Time
formulas.name: formDateTimeTODAY

formulas.description: Geo or Region has the value “Not Found”
formulas.name: formGeoRegionisNotFound

formulas.description: SFDC 4812 - Determine if account has a master's partner account and if that partner has a PSM
formulas.name: formPSMid

formulas.description: Stamp Territory as Geo + Customer Group + Region
formulas.name: formTerritoryStamp

formulas.description: Stampes GEO + Customer Group if HQ State is Blank
formulas.name: formTerritoryStampHQisNull

formulas.description: SFDC 3211
formulas.name: formTODAY

formulas.description: Determines if the current account has a CSM or not. If not then this value is the parent accounts CSM, otherwise its the current value.
formulas.name: stringAccountManagerIdForAssignment

formulas.description: SFDC-4963 Removes all text after the first space in an account name
formulas.name: textAccountNameNoSpaces

formulas.description: Gets a clean version of the Website field.
formulas.name: textCleanWebsite
formulas.expression: SUBSTITUTE( IF( FIND("/", IF( FIND("www.", {!$Record.Website}) > 0, IF( FIND("//", {!$Record.Website}) > 0, SUBSTITUTE( {!$Record.Website}, LEFT( {!$Record.Website}, FIND("//www.", {!$Record.Website}) + 5), NULL ), {!$Record.Website} ), IF( FIND("//", {!$Record.Website}) > 0, SUBSTITUTE( {!$Record.Website}, LEFT( {!$Record.Website}, FIND("//", {!$Record.Website}) + 1), NULL), {!$Record.Website} ) ) ) > 0, LEFT( IF( FIND("www.",{!$Record.Website})>0, IF( FIND("//",{!$Record.Website})>0, SUBSTITUTE( {!$Record.Website}, LEFT( {!$Record.Website}, FIND("//www.",{!$Record.Website}) + 5 ), NULL), {!$Record.Website} ), IF( FIND("//",{!$Record.Website})>0, SUBSTITUTE( {!$Record.Website}, LEFT( {!$Record.Website}, FIND("//",{!$Record.Website}) + 1 ), NULL ), {!$Record.Website} ) ), FIND("/", IF( FIND("www.",{!$Record.Website})>0, IF( FIND("//",{!$Record.Website})>0, SUBSTITUTE( {!$Record.Website}, LEFT( {!$Record.Website}, FIND("//www.", {!$Record.Website}) + 5 ), NULL ), {!$Record.Website}), IF( FIND("//",{!$Record.Website}) > 0, SUBSTITUTE( {!$Record.Website}, LEFT( {!$Record.Website}, FIND("//",{!$Record.Website}) + 1 ), NULL ), {!$Record.Website} ) ) ) -1 ), IF( FIND("www.",{!$Record.Website})>0, IF( FIND("//",{!$Record.Website})>0, SUBSTITUTE( {!$Record.Website}, LEFT( {!$Record.Website}, FIND("//www.",{!$Record.Website})+5), NULL ), {!$Record.Website} ), IF( FIND("//",{!$Record.Website})>0, SUBSTITUTE( {!$Record.Website}, LEFT( {!$Record.Website}, FIND( "//", {!$Record.Website}) + 1 ), NULL ), {!$Record.Website}) ) ), 'www.', '' )

formulas.description: Consolidates the various partner type fields for use in looking up partner data.
formulas.name: textPartnerType
formulas.expression: IF( OR( ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Experts_Tier__c} , "Silver"), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Experts_Tier__c} , "Gold"), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Experts_Tier__c} , "Platinum"), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Experts_Tier__c} , "Elite"), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Experts_Tier__c} , "Klaviyo Partner")), "Masters", IF( OR( ISPICKVAL( {!$Record.Services_Tier__c}, "Silver"), ISPICKVAL( {!$Record.Services_Tier__c}, "Gold"), ISPICKVAL( {!$Record.Services_Tier__c},"Platinum"), ISPICKVAL( {!$Record.Services_Tier__c},"Elite"), ISPICKVAL( {!$Record.Services_Tier__c}, "Klaviyo Partner")),"Advisors", IF( OR( ISPICKVAL( {!$Record.RP_Referral_Partner_Tier__c},"Silver"), ISPICKVAL( {!$Record.RP_Referral_Partner_Tier__c} ,"Gold"), ISPICKVAL( {!$Record.RP_Referral_Partner_Tier__c} ,"Platinum"), ISPICKVAL( {!$Record.RP_Referral_Partner_Tier__c} ,"Elite"), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.RP_Referral_Partner_Tier__c} ,"Klaviyo Partner")),"Influencers", IF( ISPICKVAL( {!$Record.RP_Referral_Partner_Type__c} ,"Platform Partner"),"Platform Partner", IF( ISPICKVAL( {!$Record.RP_Referral_Partner_Type__c} ,"Technology Partner"),"Technology Partner", IF( OR( ISPICKVAL({!$Record.RP_Referral_Partner_Type__c},"Investment Firm - VC"), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.RP_Referral_Partner_Type__c},"Investment Firm - PE")),"Investment Firm",""))))))

formulas.description: Checks the three Tier fields to get a consolidated Tier.
formulas.name: varPartnerTierConsolidated
formulas.expression: IF( AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Experts_Tier__c},"")), NOT(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Experts_Tier__c},"Partner Prospect")), NOT(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Experts_Tier__c},"Left Program")), NOT(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Experts_Tier__c},"Partner Rejected"))), TEXT({!$Record.Experts_Tier__c}), IF( AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Services_Tier__c},"")), NOT(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Services_Tier__c},"Partner Prospect")), NOT(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Services_Tier__c},"Left Program")), NOT(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Services_Tier__c},"Partner Rejected")) ), TEXT({!$Record.Services_Tier__c}), IF( AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.RP_Referral_Partner_Tier__c},"")), NOT(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.RP_Referral_Partner_Tier__c},"Partner Prospect")), NOT(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.RP_Referral_Partner_Tier__c},"Left Program")), NOT(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.RP_Referral_Partner_Tier__c},"Partner Rejected"))), TEXT({!$Record.RP_Referral_Partner_Tier__c}),"")))
